context: In <a0_0><b5_0>1981<b5_0/><a0_0/>, the <a3_0><b8_0>MUSE<b8_0/><a3_0/> system was demonstrated for the first time in the United States, using the same <a1_0><b6_0>5:3<b6_0/><a1_0/> aspect ratio as the Japanese system. Upon visiting a demonstration of <a4_0><b9_0>MUSE<b9_0/><a4_0/> in Washington, US <a2_0><b7_0>President Ronald Reagan<b7_0/><a2_0/> was impressed and officially declared it "a matter of national interest" to introduce HDTV to the US.
